channel.title: Necroits Minecraft Server [Hamachi]
channel.description:
~Server name: [size=18pt][font=impact]Necroits[/font][/size] ~Server IP: [size=14pt]5.112.52.136[/size] ~Hamachi ~Login: ~ Name: Necroits Server Necroits Server A Necroits Server B Necroits Server C (NEW) ~ Password: Necroits ~Legit server (Offline for cracked clients) ~Premium Account/No Premium Account ~Rules ~ No excessive swearing. ~ No griefing! ~Admins: ~ Nizura ~ Contact: ~ Necroits@gmail.com ~ NecroitsEmpire webs com (Dont forget the dots) ~ Necroits Hamachi group chat. (Tukkun-PC) ~ Necroits Minecraft Server chat (If im online)
~For more information, please visit NecroitsEmpire webs com [size=18pt]NO I WILL NOT MAKE YOU OP! I WILL DECIDE TO MAKE YOU OP IF I CAN TRUST YOU ENOUGH! [/size] Now rocking the following plugins: Permissions iConomy Jobs Demigods Vampire EasyRPG Chairs (Ability to sit on stairs/slabs) Tables (Ability to put pressure plates on Fences to make a table) BATTLE ARENA! Chop trees (no more climbing trees to chop them) Factions And more!
Anti- Grief: Now with an ingame login system. A cracked client user cant use your character because of IN
GAME password protect. When not logged in in game, you cant move, talk, build/break
anything.
Property can now be protected by your faction, or by the gods
(NEW) Come on archers and rogues! Take out those bows and call em guns! If the following ammo is next to your bow, it will shoot: flame_thrower: material: flint_and_steel
crossbow: material: arrow damage: 2 # this is the default damage of an arrow
revolver: material: snow_ball
shotgun: material: seeds damage: 0.5 # this is per bullet!
sniper: material: apple
gatlin: material: glowstone_dust
DONT FORGET TO THROW A GRENADE OR 2! grenades: slime ball: action: explosive cluster: 4 # this determines the number of spawned bombs!
tnt: action: tnt
golden apple: action: nuclear yield: 8 # that's big!!! make backups and stand back! you have been warned! cannon: false # enable at your own peril! cannon-factor: 2 # probably want to be conservative with this!
lava bucket: action: molotov
water bucket: action: water_balloon

item.title: Necroits Minecraft Server [Hamachi]
item.dc:creator: @_Ix_Miir_xI .::Ix Miir xI::.
item.description:
@_Ix_Miir_xI wrote:

[quote=“sttukkun, post:6, topic:401215”]No. You fuckin port foward. This is an advertisement for an already set up with members server. Go make your own damn server and run things there. If you did it’s probably a fail cause you spend all your time here.

And you know what. “Hate to break it to you, but no one really plays hamachi unless it’s a group of irl friends or something.”

It’s called social skill. Rather if it’s in real life, you have enough skill to socialize with people that you are in a good light and make others want to be around you. I’ve done that in real life and on the internet. You cant do either cause… well… you need to portfoward to make your server “successful” I’ve got 3 near full hamachi networks linking to my server. I guess well, i have a lot of rl friends… or something 9by something meaning good social skills.)

Grow up.
Learn to be positively productive in life.
Then come back. Then you will see how much of an uneducated, anti-social, attention seeking nerd you really are.

You give humanity a bad name.[/quote]
hamachi’s shit bro

Read full topic

No. You fuckin port foward. This is an advertisement for an already set up with members server. Go make your own damn server and run things there. If you did it’s probably a fail cause you spend all your time here.

And you know what. “Hate to break it to you, but no one really plays hamachi unless it’s a group of irl friends or something.”

It’s called social skill. Rather if it’s in real life, you have enough skill to socialize with people that you are in a good light and make others want to be around you. I’ve done that in real life and on the internet. You cant do either cause… well… you need to portfoward to make your server “successful” I’ve got 3 near full hamachi networks linking to my server. I guess well, i have a lot of rl friends… or something 9by something meaning good social skills.)

Grow up.
Learn to be positively productive in life.
Then come back. Then you will see how much of an uneducated, anti-social, attention seeking nerd you really are.

You give humanity a bad name.
[/quote]
I cannot see why you raged at me? i did say please, i also wanted you to portforward so i could play due to i don’t have hamachi.[/quote]
No, the 2nd half of the post was directed at me. Oh, how I want to make this kid feel like shit… looks like it’ll have to be another day…

item.title: Necroits Minecraft Server [Hamachi]
item.dc:creator: @sttukkun sttukkun
item.description:
@sttukkun wrote:

~Server name: [size=18pt][font=impact]Necroits[/font][/size]
~Server IP: [size=14pt]5.112.52.136[/size]
~Hamachi
~Login:
~ Name: Necroits Server
Necroits Server A
Necroits Server B
Necroits Server C (NEW)
~ Password: Necroits
~Legit server (Offline for cracked clients)
~Premium Account/No Premium Account
~Rules
~ No excessive swearing.
~ No griefing!
~Admins:
~ Nizura
~ Contact:
~ Necroits@gmail.com
~ NecroitsEmpire webs com (Dont forget the dots)
~ Necroits Hamachi group chat. (Tukkun-PC)
~ Necroits Minecraft Server chat (If im online)

~For more information, please visit NecroitsEmpire webs com
[size=18pt]NO I WILL NOT MAKE YOU OP! I WILL DECIDE TO MAKE YOU OP IF I CAN TRUST YOU ENOUGH!
[/size]
Now rocking the following plugins:
Permissions
iConomy
Jobs
Demigods
Vampire
EasyRPG
Chairs (Ability to sit on stairs/slabs)
Tables (Ability to put pressure plates on Fences to make a table)
BATTLE ARENA!
Chop trees (no more climbing trees to chop them)
Factions
And more!

Anti- Grief:
Now with an ingame login system. A cracked client user cant use your character because of IN

GAME password protect. When not logged in in game, you cant move, talk, build/break

anything.

Property can now be protected by your faction, or by the gods

(NEW)
Come on archers and rogues! Take out those bows and call em guns!
If the following ammo is next to your bow, it will shoot:
flame_thrower:
material: flint_and_steel

    crossbow:
        material: arrow
        damage:   2 # this is the default damage of an arrow

    revolver:
        material: snow_ball

    shotgun:
        material: seeds
        damage:   0.5 # this is per bullet!

    sniper:
        material: apple

    gatlin:
        material: glowstone_dust

DONT FORGET TO THROW A GRENADE OR 2!
grenades:
slime ball:
action: explosive
cluster: 4 # this determines the number of spawned bombs!

    tnt:
        action: tnt

    golden apple:
        action:        nuclear
        yield:         8 # that's big!!! make backups and stand back! you have been warned!
        cannon:        false # enable at your own peril!
        cannon-factor: 2 # probably want to be conservative with this!

    lava bucket:
        action: molotov

    water bucket:
        action: water_balloon

Read full topic
